# isClassificationSupported

**Type Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether plane classification is available on the current device.

## Declaration

```swift
class var isClassificationSupported: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

Plane classification is available on iOS devices with A12 or later GPU.

On devices without plane classification support, all plane anchors report a [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARPlaneAnchor/classification-2hi2p] value of  [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARPlaneClassification/ARPlaneClassificationNone] and a [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARPlaneAnchor/classificationStatus] value of [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARPlaneClassificationStatus/ARPlaneClassificationStatusNotAvailable].

## Classifying a Plane

- **classification**: A general characterization of what kind of real-world surface the plane anchor represents.
- **ARPlaneAnchor.Classification**: Possible characterizations of real-world surfaces represented by plane anchors.
